flavorText:
"Whiptails can sense a traveler's footsteps from a great distance. Measuring that distance has been . . . difficult."
—Jalun, Affa sentry

foreignData.flavorText: „Peitschenschwänze können die Schritte von Reisenden über große Entfernungen spüren. Diese Entfernungen zu messen erwies sich als … schwierig."—Jalun, Wachposten in Affa
foreignData.name: Angriffslustiger Peitschenschwanz
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält der Angriffslustige Peitschenschwanz Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: "Los colalátigos pueden oír los pasos de un viajero a gran distancia. Medir exactamente a cuánto ha resultado... complicado".—Jalun, centinela de Affa
foreignData.name: Colalátigo beligerante
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Colalátigo beligerante gana la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les queues en fouet peuvent détecter les pas d'un voyageur à une grande distance. Mesurer cette distance s'est avéré... compliqué. »—Jalun, sentinelle d'Affa
foreignData.name: Queue en fouet belligérant
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Queue en fouet belligérant acquiert l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "I codafrusta possono percepire i passi di un viandante da una distanza notevole. Misurare con esattezza questa distanza si è rivelato... difficile."—Jalun, sentinella di Affa
foreignData.name: Codafrusta Bellicoso
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Codafrusta Bellicoso ha attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「鞭尾は旅人の足音をとても遠くから聞き分ける。どれくらい遠くかというと……よくわからない。」――アーファの歩哨、ジャルン
foreignData.name: 好戦的な鞭尾
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、ターン終了時まで、好戦的な鞭尾は先制攻撃を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ワーム

foreignData.flavorText: "꼬리채찍은 아주 먼 거리에서도 여행자의 발자국 소리를 들을 수 있어. 그 거리를 정확히 가늠하긴 . . . 매우 어려워."—아파 보초병 잘런
foreignData.name: 적대적인 꼬리채찍
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 적대적인 꼬리채찍은 턴종료까지 선제공격을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Os caudas-de-chicote conseguem sentir os passos de um viajante a uma grande distância. Medir essa distância tem sido... difícil."— Jalun, sentinela de Affa
foreignData.name: Cauda-de-chicote Belicoso
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Cauda-de-chicote Belicoso ganha iniciativa até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Кнутохвосты могут почувствовать шаги путника на огромном расстоянии. Точно измерить это расстояние оказалось... сложной задачей».— Джалун, стражник из Аффы
foreignData.name: Воинственный Кнутохвост
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Воинственный Кнутохвост получает Первый удар до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「鞭尾亚龙可以感知远方旅人的脚步。具体能感知多远...实在是很难测算。」～艾法哨兵佳伦
foreignData.name: 好斗鞭尾亚龙
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，好斗鞭尾亚龙获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「鞭尾亞龍可以感知遠方旅人的腳步。至於能感知到多遠...實在是很難測量。」～艾法哨兵佳倫
foreignData.name: 好鬥鞭尾亞龍
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，好鬥鞭尾亞龍獲得先攻異能直到回合結束。

name: Belligerent Whiptail
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.

When a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the ability has an additional or replacement effect that depends on the land having a certain basic land type, the ability will check that land’s type as the ability resolves. If, at that time, the land that entered the battlefield is no longer on the battlefield, use its types when it left the battlefield to determine what happens.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.
